hanzi-su-wiki:
髄

Значения

Спинной (костный) мозг

Мнемоника

Мозг следует через все кости 骨, наполняя их.

Варианты

髓, 膸
purpleculture_pinyin:
suǐ
variant of 髓
вариант пробкового
rtega_mnemonic:
髓髓RS
髄髄		膸bone marrow, essences, substances
  • bone marrow follows 遀/迶 the length of the bone 骨 and is it's essence
heisig_constituent: marrow, skeleton, joint, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, highwayman, possess, by one’s side, road, moon2, month2, flesh2, part of the body2
koohiiStory1: A skeleton is shuffling along the shoulder of the road, so you pull up next to him and ask where he is going. He says he´s going to donate his marrow to the hospital because he got into some financial trouble and lost everything; his marrow is the only thing he still possesses.
koohiiStory2: A skeleton by the side of the road, holding a sign "Possess marrow, will travel". Yeah, it makes no sense but I don´t foget the kanji.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your bones have a scooter that moves through the bone marrow inside them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: If you think about it, bone marrow is really just a road for tiny blood scooters.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you put your ear really close a bone with marrow still in it, you'll hear the scooters going zuwee (ずい) as they move the blood around inside there.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: That's how doctors can tell if there's something wrong with your bone marrow. If they can't hear the zuuwee of the scooters, you're gonna die soon. I mean, maybe, I'm not a doctor.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ノ, 冖 (ва), 込 (внутрь), 月 (месяц), 骨 (кость)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the bone (骨) you possess (有) that can move (⻌) is the marrow

Name meaning

suǐ
яп., вм. 髓
Radicals: 骨, 有  (bone, have, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your bones have a scooter that moves through the bone marrow inside them.
If you think about it, bone marrow is really just a road for tiny blood scooters.
Reading Mnemonic
If you put your ear really close a bone with marrow still in it, you'll hear the scooters going zuwee (ずい) as they move the blood around inside there.
That's how doctors can tell if there's something wrong with your bone marrow. If they can't hear the zuuwee of the scooters, you're gonna die soon. I mean, maybe, I'm not a doctor.
